text: Luna Park Ride is the third live album released by the Finnish soprano Tarja Turunen as a solo artist. The concert was filmed at Stadium Luna Park in Buenos Aires, Argentina by the fans and mixed by Tim Palmer. Apart from this show the release also contains 70 minutes of bonus material filmed during 2010-2014. ==Track listing== ==Charts performance== {| class="wikitable sortable" !DVDs Chart (2015) !Peak position |- |Switzerland DVD Chart |align="center"|3 |- |} {| class="wikitable sortable" !Albums Chart (2015) !Peak position |- |Belgium Albums Chart (Flanders) |align="center"|176 |- |Belgium Albums Chart (Wallonia) |align="center"|114 |- |German Albums Chart |align="center"|55 |- |} ==References== ==External links== * Luna Park Ride website * Tarja Official on Facebook * Tarja Turunen Official Website Category:2012 live albums Category:2012 video albums Category:Tarja Turunen albums Category:Edel AG albums Category:Live video albums Category:Albums recorded at Estadio Luna Park
title: Luna Park Ride
